text:
sshexec was used multiple times to execute commands on unix system (aix).
The execution of the commands were successful.  The log of the first execution
of sshexec appears in the stdout file, but the subsequent entries in null
characters in the stdout file.

Note that this is similar to Bug 36302.
creator: glennoph@yahoo.com

text:
Created attachment 19369
log from multiple sshexec calls

log showing that the first sshexec execution information ok.  However the
subsequent sshexec records are null characters.
creator: glennoph@yahoo.com

text: works for me with Ant 1.7.1 and JSch 0.1.29, so it either is a bug we've fixed by now or there must be something specific to your setup.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text: I'll assume it is fixed by now
creator: bodewig@apache.org
